info.name: Gpx Pod
info.description:
Fork of standalone GpxPod and GpxVComp projects.
!! Server needs python2.x gpxpy module to work !!
App to display gpx files collections, view elevation profiles and tracks stats, filter tracks, color tracks by speed, slope, elevation...
In order to make GpxPod work, you need to create a gpx folder at the top level of your files. The gpx file collection needs to be found in any direct subfolder of the gpx so that your file tree looks like :
-- pics/
-- whatever/
-- gpx/
--|---- gpx/bike/
--|------|---- gpx/bike/bike_tour1.gpx
--|------|---- gpx/bike/bike_tour2.gpx
--|---- gpx/hike/
--|------|---- gpx/hike/everest.gpx
--|------|---- gpx/hike/k2.gpx
-- stuff/
The comparison between tracks is done on alternative parts of tracks that have common parts.
info.author: Julien Veyssier
